headline: BDX Shares May Climb as GalaFLEX LITE Trial Hits Key Milestone
summary: BD advances its clinical trial for the bioabsorbable GalaFLEX LITE scaffold, aiming to improve outcomes in breast implant revision surgeries and patient recovery.

raw.headline: BDX Shares May Climb as GalaFLEX LITE Trial Hits Key Milestone
